articles.title: ‘Surprisingly resilient’: IMF lifts global growth forecasts - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Fund says demand in the US and Europe has been stronger than expected, and that only the UK faces a recession.
articles.content: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has raised its 2023 global growth outlook slightly due to surprisingly resilient demand in the United States and Europe and the reopening of Chinas economy after… [+4956 chars]

Russias invasion of Ukraine has caused thousands of deaths and destroyed entire cities.
Western countries have answered Kyivs pleas for military aid.
